data.name: The Art of Citizen Sleeper
data.detailed_description:
The Art of Citizen Sleeper is an 84-page art book detailing the environments, the characters and the making of Citizen Sleeper.

Featuring concept art and prototypes from developer Gareth Damian Martin, and sketches and character art from comic artist Guillaume Singelin, the book offers insights on development and a behind-the-scenes look at the games striking character designs.

To access the art book:


  • Right click Citizen Sleeper in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open the The Art of Citizen Sleeper folder
The art book will be downloaded to this Steam folder in PDF format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Any DirectX-compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10.5 or above
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
